Ceremony & Celebration

what you need to know for our big day

The wedding ceremony will be held in the Chapel at the First Baptist Church of Shreveport, LA. The receptions will follow at the Scottish Rite Temple.

Date
Saturday June 20th, 2015
Time
5:00pm
Ceremony
First Baptist Church
543 Ockley Drive, Shreveport, LA 71106
Reception
Scottish Rite Temple
725 Cotton Street Shreveport, LA 71101
Attire
Black Tie Optional*
Parking
Free valet service provided at the reception
Hotel
Courtyard by Marriott In Bossier
Click above for special rates and reservations
or call (513) 672-7100
